articles.description: Manchester United's Joshua Zirkzee enjoyed a dream debut in win against Fulham, but what next for Jadon Sancho?
articles.title: Man Utd 1-0 Fulham: Zirkzee makes dream start but what next for Sancho?

articles.description: Harry Kane is on the scoresheet as Bayern Munich thrash second-division Ulm in the German Cup in manager Vincent Kompany's first match in charge.
articles.title: Ulm vs Bayern Munich: Harry Kane scores as Vincent Kompany starts with win

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe, PSG's record goalscorer with 244 goals, moved to Real Madrid on a five-year deal in the summer after his contract with the French club ended.
articles.title: Le Havre 1-4 Paris St-Germain: PSG win first match without Kylian Mbappe

articles.description: Australia's Minjee Lee and Megan Khang of the USA are tied for the halfway lead at the Women's Scottish Open, with England's Charley Hull in a share of third spot.
articles.title: Women's Scottish Open: Minjee Lee and Megan Khang share halfway lead

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his team's 1-0 win over Fulham on the opening day of the Premier League can provide a "platform" for them to build on this season.
articles.title: Manchester United 1-0 Fulham: Win gives Man Utd platform to build on - Erik Ten Hag

articles.description: Bournemouth complete the signing of striker Evanilson from Porto in a club record £40.2m deal.
articles.title: Evanilson: Bournemouth sign Brazilian forward in club record deal

articles.description: Nottingham Forest sign up Paraguay forward Ramon Sosa for a reported £11m from Talleres.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Ramon Sosa signs as Paraguay forward moves to Premier League

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says they are still looking to strengthen the squad after failing to sign Martin Zubimendi.
articles.title: Arne Slot says Liverpool still trying to strengthen after failing to sign Martin Zubimendi

articles.description: Two-time Olympic weightlifting medallist Emily Campbell says she is undecided about lifting again at LA 2028 and dreams of opening her own gym.
articles.title: Emily Campbell: Olympic weightlifting medallist dreams of opening own gym

articles.description: British cyclist Pfeiffer Georgi suffers neck fractures and a broken hand after crashing on stage five of the Tour de France Femmes.
articles.title: Tour de France Femmes 2024: Pfeiffer Georgi fractured neck and broke hand in stage five crash
